mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectPrmCrsDcAplGod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PRM_NO , APL_TGT_GOD_GRP_CD , GOD_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM PRM_CRS_DC_APL_GOD WHERE 1 = 1 AND PRM_NO = #{prmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND APL_TGT_GOD_GRP_CD = #{aplTgtGodGrpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
